CustomField.formula:
IF(OR( BEGINS(TEXT(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c), 'Closed') , BEGINS(TEXT(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c), 'HOLD') , BEGINS(TEXT(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Stage__c), 'Complete') ),
IF(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Office_Signoff_Date__c - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 14,'1-2 Weeks', IF(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Office_Signoff_Date__c - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 28,'3-4 Weeks', IF(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Office_Signoff_Date__c - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 42, '5-6 Weeks', IF(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Office_Signoff_Date__c - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 56, '7-8 Weeks', IF(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Office_Signoff_Date__c - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 70, '9-10 Weeks', IF(Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Office_Signoff_Date__c - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c >= 71, '11-12+ Weeks', "Instatus Transition")))))) , IF(TODAY() - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 14, '1-2 Weeks', IF(TODAY() - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 28, '3-4 Weeks', IF(TODAY() - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 42, '5-6 Weeks', IF(TODAY() - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 56, '7-8 Weeks', IF(TODAY() - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c <= 70, '9-10 Weeks', IF(TODAY() - Portfolio__r.Residence__r.Most_Recent_Rehab__r.Rehab_Aging_Start_Date__c >= 71, '11-12+ Weeks', "Instatus Transition")))))) )
CustomField.label: Aging - Rehab from Re-Key
